name: Bouncy Balls (JaykerX)
description:
Small game about bouncing and merging ball. Game follows RGB color scheme.

Still in early beta.

Controls:

LMB - Spawn Bubbles
RMS - Spawn Balls

MMB - Change Rendering(experimental)
A/D - Change Level(Beta)
W/S - Change Camera(Q/E reset)
O/P - Speed Up/Down Balls(Beta)

Still need a goal for levels, some ideas are presented in levels 3 and 6. I would love to hear some ideas in comments.
